posts.post_content: T206 Black Cap Throwing -- Sovereign 350 -- SGC 80 SOLD

Doug, yes, that Chase throwing with black cap is one of the Super Prints, the Sovereign 350. And no, it was not included in Ted's survey.
Prices lowered; with trophy Sovereign 460 remains.
Any info on the Endicott Find?
